#summary FancyBox Demo

= Introduction =

On this page a number of demo's will be shown using the FancyBox jQuery plugin.

A number of demo's will be shown to show a number of possibilities of the pwi application.

The following demo's are shown:
 * [FancyBoxDemoLatest#Demo1:_Default_usage Default usage]


= Demo1: Default usage =

This demo shows the use of FancyBox without any configuration.

The following settings are used for this demo:
{{{
    var settings = {
        username: '<USERNAME>',
        popupExt: function(photos){
            photos.fancybox()
            }
    }
}}}
